description: This file defines the MainActivity for an Android app using Jetpack Compose, serving as the main entry point. It sets up the app theme and displays the ExpenseTrackerScreen, which provides functionalities for navigating months, viewing summaries, managing transactions, and filtering transaction lists. The activity is a simple host for the Compose UI with no persistence logic.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: MainActivity serves as the entry point of the Expense Tracker app, hosting the Compose UI and setting up the app theme.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, setting the Compose content that applies the app theme and displays the ExpenseTrackerScreen.
